snippet.title: Riffle Effect Game Promo
snippet.description:
Riffle Effect

Steam® Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479400/_/

"If you get hurt... I'll fix it."
Gatto, a lone mercenary, has been working with Rose, a space navigating AI, through the arrangement of his employer.
Then, Gatto's ship falls through a wormhole and is lost on the planet Ulun.
The spaceship lost power and Rose's functions stopped.
In order to fix the spaceship and return home with Rose, Gatto adventures on Ulun.

The game is played from two different perspectives: a bird's-eye view and a TPS view.
New type of shooting action game with 2 types of perspectives!

PV narration by Rin Oninosuzu
YouTube channel
https://www.youtube.com/c/Oninosuzu_Rin
Twitter
https://twitter.com/rinoninosuzu

Riffle Effect
Distributed by CREST
Developer: OutsiderKids
Genre: Stylish Shooter
Player: 1 player
